statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={185.6}{e}^{{{0.0274}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0274}}\approx{1.027778832085}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.027778832085}-{1}={0.027778832084979}\approx{0.0278} and the percent is 2.78.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
